overview:
Brendon Macaraeg currently leads the online product development efforts for digital sponsors like Sears, Microsoft and Citibank that partner with Live Nation Entertainment. Additionally, he also manages the official website for House of Blues, which Live Nation acquired in 2006.

As Director of Product Management in Live Nation’s Digital Distribution Group, Brendon is charged with developing the online product strategy and roadmap for HOB.com, the official website of House of Blues. He’s successfully led the Houseofblues.com redesign project to bring the site into line with the HOB brand and current web presentation techniques.

Prior to joining Live Nation, Brendon lead subscription maximization efforts at Reunion.com. Prior to Reunion.com, he worked at United Online as a sr. product marketing manager, responsible for the company’s winback and upsell marketing campaigns to the NetZero and Juno ISP customer base. Brendon also worked as a web designer and then advertising programs manager at @Home Network, which merged in 1999 with Excite.com to form Excite@Home.

He is a graduate of Minnesota State University - Moorhead where he received a B.S. in Mass Communications with a print journalism emphasis. He also received his Master’s degree from New York University’s prestigious Interactive Telecommunications Program. He’s also a Dale Carnegie program graduate.
